title: S23 Ultimate Footstep Collection
description: Studio 23’s Ultimate Footsteps Collection contains all 12 of our footstep packs in one complete bundle, containing 4,119 high quality sounds (Approximately 20,000 individual sounds)
longDescription:
Studio 23’s ‘Ultimate Footsteps Bundle’ gives you access to all of our recorded footsteps sounds covering over 11 surfaces and featuring 7 different footstep types across multiple performances. This gives you the ultimate freedom in any creative situation and has been designed with ease of use in mind. The pack consists of individually recorded and edited files alongside stereo loops to allow for the greatest flexibility within your projects. Each of our 3,593 individually edited Mono sound files have been meticulously crafted so that they can be used without any further editing, cutting down on production time. The stereo loops can sound very natural dropped directly into your project.

Audio Library Features

• Totalling 4,119 high quality .wav files, covering over 11 surfaces each containing 7 different footstep types, including 509 loops, you can be sure there is a diverse selection of sounds for every situation.

• 3,593 individual mono sounds and 526 stereo sounds (Including sequences).

• Contains approximately 20,000 sounds.

• Contains, footsteps, Slides, Jumps, Lands and Singles, with each one individually cut so they can be accurately dropped into a project straight away. Also including loops providing longer performances with the added flexibility for further editing/sound design for your projects specific requirements.

• 5 Different loop performances with varying speed for each Shoe type.

• The pack is organised into folders, embedded with Soundminer metadata

• Audio recording at 96kHz and 24bit for HD quality. Down-sampled to 44.1kHz, 16 bit


Video Preview - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dsUJ-utc3Nk&t=11s
technicalDetails:
Also Includes our sound designed extras exclusive to the ‘Ultimate Footstep Collection’. These can be used to add depth to your projects as layers for footsteps. The extras also include unique footsteps types such as creatures and robots. For more information regarding our extra footstep pack please check out the metadata Spreadsheet for a full list of all included sounds.

Metadata sheet - https://drive.google.com/file/d/1pPuA9LXKGr7ICAGufX-nylwrPiuDCYas/view?usp=sharing

Preview - https://soundcloud.com/user-785478514/s23-ultimate-footsteps-bundle-preview

• Leather Trainers

• Loafers

• Socks

• Single Footsteps

• Scrapes

• Jumps

• Lands

• Single hits

• Walking (Slow) Loop

• Walking (Normal) Loop

• Walking (Fast) Loop

• Jogging Loop

• Running Loop


Number of Audio Waves: 4,119

Number of Audio Cues: 4,119

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo wavs

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 2h:28m:41s

Supported Development Platforms: All

Supported Target Build Platforms: All
